channel.title: Teleporting other ppls
channel.description: Can anyone post the code for teleporting other ppls and add sendmessage to it = \ plzz i really need it one where you type like ::tele cords playersname

item.title: Teleporting other ppls
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

I have one in LeScape Pk’s Command & Code Factory Thread. It’s been tested and it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleporting other ppls
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

if(command.equals("telep")){
   try{
     String name = command.substring(15, command.length());
     for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
	if(p != null)  {
            if(p.playerName.equals(name)){
                p.teleToX = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 9));
                p.teleToY = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10, 14));
            }
        }
     }
  } catch (Exception e){
      sendMessage("Error executing command: " + e.getMessage());
      e.printStackTrace();
  }
}

Try that.

Read full topic
